note.p: Education: Dundee; University of Edinburgh. BSc

Career: Professor of Mechanical Engineering, University of Tokyo, Japan (1878-1883); Professor of Engineering, University College, Dublin (1883-1890); Professor of Mechnism and Applied Mechanics, University of Cambridge (1890-1903); Principal and Vice-Chancellor, University of Edinburgh (1916)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1932-1935 vol l pp 475-492, plate, by R T Glazebrook
References: R V Jones, 'Alfred Ewing and "Room 40"' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 65-90, plate
T M Charlton, 'Professor Bertram Hopkinson, CMG, MA, BSc, FRS (1874-1918)' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 101-109
Notes: Date of death incorrect in ON.
